title: Research Interest
text: Hello everyone, I’m Sechang Kim. I’ve studied geography so far, and eager to investigate population studies in the spatial perspectives. Any contact or suggestion is welcomed.

title: Research Interest
text:
Education

M.A., 2024, Dept. of Geography Education, Seoul National University

Advisor: Sang-Il Lee(Professor, Deparment of Geography, Seoul National University)
Thesis: A Study on Internal Migration Modeling based on the Spatial Demographic Perspective: Utilizing Cross-Classified Multilevel Model
GPA: 4.25/4.3(4.46/4.5)

B.A., 2022, Dept. of Geography Education, Seoul National University

GPA: 3.90/4.3(4.10/4.5)
Honors: Summa Cum Laude

title: Research Interest
text:
Careers

June 2024 - Now : Assistant Manager, Center for Educational Research, Seoul National University
Feb 2018 - Oct 2019 : Sergeant, Republic of Korea Army

MOS: Terrain Analysis in Engineering(so-called “GIS Specialty”)

title: Personal Experience
text:
I’ve developed and taught various programs in secondary schools, often, but not always, using GIS with a demographic phenomenon. Here’s a brief overview of what I’ve designed and taught.



In Korean | 인구구조를 통한 지역 이해
Where | Garak High School, Seoul(서울 가락고등학교)
When | Mar 2020, Mar 2021, Mar 2022, Mar 2023





In Korean | 커뮤니티 매핑으로 꿈꾸는 배리어프리 세상
Where

Bokjeong High School, Sungnam(성남 복정고등학교)
Hyundai High School, Seoul(서울 현대고등학교)
Sampyung Middle School, Sungnam(성남 삼평중학교)

When

Jul 2024, Oct 2022, Oct 2023
May 2023, Dec 2023
Jul 2023
